trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert data for an image key to and from another data type.
trans-unit.target: 提供型別轉換子 (Type Converter)，將影像索引鍵的資料與其他資料型別相互轉換。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter> class is used to convert key values of an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to and from other data types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter>類別用來將轉換的索引鍵值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>與其他資料型別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56).
trans-unit.target: 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基底類別和[How to： 實作類型轉換器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do not directly create an instance of an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter>.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您無法直接建立的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter>。

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class.
trans-unit.target: 請改為呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> 類別的 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: 提供格式內容的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that specifies the type you want to convert from.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，指定您想要轉換的來源型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this converter can convert an object of the given type to a string using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個轉換子是否可以使用指定的內容 (Context)，將指定型別的物件轉換為字串。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the specified conversion can be performed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示可以執行指定的轉換，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: 提供格式內容的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> to provide locale information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />，用於提供地區設定資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要進行轉換的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts from the specified object to a string.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件轉換為字串。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，代表轉換過的值。

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行轉換作業。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides a format context, which can be used to extract additional information about the environment this type converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: 提供格式內容的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />，可用來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個類型轉換子正從此環境叫用。

trans-unit.source: This parameter or properties of this parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數或這個參數的屬性可為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> that provides locale information.
trans-unit.target: 提供地區設定資訊的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert, typically an image key.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的物件，通常為影像索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The type to convert the object to.
trans-unit.target: 要將物件轉換成的類型。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given object to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件轉換為指定類型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the converted <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，代表轉換的 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destinationType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified <paramref name="value" /> could not be converted to the specified <paramref name="destinationType" />.
trans-unit.target: 無法將指定的 <paramref name="value" /> 轉換為指定的 <paramref name="destinationType" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides a format context, which can be used to extract additional information about the environment this type converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: 提供格式內容的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />，可用來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個類型轉換子正從此環境叫用。

trans-unit.source: This parameter or properties of this parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數或這個參數的屬性可為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of standard image keys for the image list associated with the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與指定內容關聯之影像清單的標準影像索引鍵集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" /> that contains the standard set of image key values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" />，包含標準的影像索引鍵值集合。

trans-unit.source: If no image list is found, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter> supports `null` as a standard value, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method returns a collection containing a single empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果不找到任何影像清單，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter>支援`null`為標準值時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>方法會傳回集合，其中包含單一的空白字串。

trans-unit.source: If no image list is found, and `null` is not supported as a standard value, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> returns an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果不找到任何影像清單，以及`null`為標準值時，不支援<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>會傳回空集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides a format context, which can be used to extract additional information about the environment this type converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: 提供格式內容的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />，可用來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個類型轉換子正從此環境叫用。

trans-unit.source: This parameter or properties of this parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數或這個參數的屬性可為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the list of standard values for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter" /> is exclusive (that is, whether it allows values other than those returned by <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter.GetStandardValues" />).
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter" /> 的標準值清單是否為獨佔 (也就是，是否允許由 <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter.GetStandardValues" /> 所傳回之值以外的值)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the list does not allow additional values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示清單不允許其他的值，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the list returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method is exclusive, no other values are valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳回的清單<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>方法是獨佔，沒有其他有效值。

trans-unit.source: This is typical of an enumerated data type.
trans-unit.target: 這是典型的列舉的資料型別。

trans-unit.source: If the list is not exclusive, there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageIndexConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> provides.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是獨占清單，沒有其他有效值除了標準的清單值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageIndexConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>提供。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in this type converter, this method always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在此型別轉換子中實作時，這個方法一律會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> method before you attempt to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您應該呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A>方法，然後再嘗試使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides a format context, which can be used to extract additional information about the environment this type converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: 提供格式內容的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />，可用來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個類型轉換子正從此環境叫用。

trans-unit.source: This parameter or properties of this parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數或這個參數的屬性可為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this type converter supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
trans-unit.target: 判斷這個型別轉換子是否支援可以從清單中選取的標準值集合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate a list of standard values is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示支援標準值清單，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> method always returns `true` since <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter> supports a standard set of index values for images that can be picked from a list.
trans-unit.target: 在中實作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter>類別，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A>方法一律會傳回`true`因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter>支援一組標準的索引值可以從清單中選取的映像。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether <see langword="null" /> is valid in the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出在 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" /> 集合中 <see langword="null" /> 是否有效。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases, indicating <see langword="null" /> is valid in the standard values collection.
trans-unit.target: 在所有狀況下皆為 <see langword="true" />，表示在標準值集合中 <see langword="null" /> 為有效。
